attributes.background: Milton Keynes deserves to be an official city so let's make it one.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The granting of city status in the UK is the responsibility of the Queen.

You could resubmit your petition calling on the government to request that the Queen grant Milton Keynes city status.

You can also write to the Queen using the following website: 

http://www.royal.gov.uk/HMTheQueen/ContactTheQueen/Overview.aspx
